casebody.data:
Paul GINSBURG, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. MUTUAL LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY OF NEW YORK, Defendant-Appellee. No. 141, Docket 25312. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Jan. 15, 1959. Decided Jan. 28, 1959. Paul Ginsburg, pro se. Carl F. Hollander, New York City (Haughton Bell, New York City, on the brief), for defendant-appellee.

Before MEDINA, LUMBARD and BURGER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the opinion of Judge Bicks, D.C., 170 F.Supp. 212.
